name: Team Garden
description: KEEP THE PRESIDENT AWAY FROM THE BOMBER
info:
You are on the Blue Team.
You win if the President does not gain the "dead" condition.

Note: Any character card that has the star icon on it is considered to be on the Blue Team (except spies).

name: Gardener
info: You are a primary character. Team Garden wins if you do not gain the "dead" condition.
